subject: Thank you for your recent loan request, we accepted your debt request
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS NIGHT):
$287,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://bathaeonand.com/
